Squizzy::

While out cold, her internal programs ran through a diognostic.  Her 
body twitched and moved while her programs started to correct 
themselves.  Her memory chip, while still damaged, went though and re-
uploaded her training programs.  When she awoke, she would remember 
her techo-organic enginering abilities and programming skills.  She 
would remember her repair skills as well.  But the other half of her 
memory, who she was, why she was there, what faction she belonged to, 
would still be missing.  Her body stopped twitching and stayed still.
